reviews.text: Absolutely and without a doubt one of the top restaurants in town. Their traditional Italian food is just out of this world, prepared just right, friendly and interested staff and at an extremely reasonable price!

We found this wonderful restaurant our last day in Italy near the Milan Cathedral.  I have to say it was the best pasta I have ever eaten!!!

I had the Mac and Cheese that they cook right in front of you and I want to go back to Italy just so I can have more!!  My mouth is salivating just thinking about it!

My son had Spaghetti and his girlfriend had lasagna and we couldn't stop talking about how good it was!  If you are going to Milan,  be sure to eat at Papa Francesco's.   You won't regret it.

The food was delicious.  They give you bread with your meal. The workers work really hard to make sure you enjoy your meal.  We are outside, very nice and clean.  A great place to relax with a meal and a drink. They have a variety of food, everything was wonderful, and I would definitely go back there again.

It was nice evening in Milano and really delicious food in Ristorante Papà Francesco. We enjoyed our meal and the dessert won us over. We didn't even have time to take a photo, because as soon as it was served to us, we literally devoured it!

It was all amazing. The only reason to put a 4 in total was that my steak was 20€ on the menu but I was charged 60€ . They write that it's served 300g of meat but it's not obvious that 20€ is for 100g meat.
